channel.title: CVE Feed for MCJack123 -- craftos2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MCJack123 -- craftos2

item.title: CVE-2024-43395|2024-08-19T15:26:20.287Z -- mcjack123 -- craftos2
item.description: CraftOS-PC 2 is a rewrite of the desktop port of CraftOS from the popular Minecraft mod ComputerCraft using C++ and a modified version of PUC Lua, as well as SDL for drawing. Prior to version 2.8.3, users of CraftOS-PC 2 on Windows can escape the computer folder and access files anywhere without permission or notice by obfuscating `..`s to bypass the internal check preventing parent directory traversal. Version 2.8.3 contains a patch for this issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-43395|2024-08-16T20:15:32.325Z -- mcjack123 -- craftos2
item.description: CraftOS-PC 2 is a rewrite of the desktop port of CraftOS from the popular Minecraft mod ComputerCraft using C++ and a modified version of PUC Lua, as well as SDL for drawing. Prior to version 2.8.3, users of CraftOS-PC 2 on Windows can escape the computer folder and access files anywhere without permission or notice by obfuscating `..`s to bypass the internal check preventing parent directory traversal. Version 2.8.3 contains a patch for this issue.
